text: Eadward cingc grett Wulfwig biscop & Raulf eorl & ealle mine þegenas on Oxnafordescire freondlice.

& ic cyðe eow þæt ic hæbbe geunnan Criste & Sancte Dionisie into his halgan mynstre begeondan sæ þæt land æt Tengctune & ælc þæra þinga þæs þe þær inn mid rihte to gebyraþ on wude & on felde mid sace & mid socne swa full & swa forð swa hitt me sylfan on hande stod on dæge & æfter for minre sawle hæle.
& wite he wið God se þe hitt of þære haligan stowe geutige.
& ic wille þæt se biscop dihte boc þær to be minan fullan geleafan.
